'''''J.R.R. Tolkien (Modern Critical Views)''''' or '''''Modern Critical Views: J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is a book published in [[2000]], edited by [[wikipedia:Harold Bloom|Harold Bloom]]. It is a compilation of several essays and book chapters relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Middle-earth]], all of them already published. 
==From the publisher==
{{blockquote| Explores the author's literary work through critical essays that examine such themes as the Middle-Earth concept, mythology, and the relationship between literature and language.}}
